casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Kevin Jonathan MITCHELL No. 208P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Kirby H. Smith, III, Attorney at Law, for Mitchell, Kevin Jonathan. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of July 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
